text: Wayback Burgers is an American fast casual restaurant chain. It is based in Cheshire, Connecticut. It serves typical hamburger restaurant foods such as hamburgers, hot dogs, chicken sandwiches, milkshakes and salads, and a variety of regional selections. It has 156 locations. It was founded in 1991 in Delaware under the name Jake's Hamburgers. ==Other websites== Official website ==References== Category:American fast food restaurants Category:1991 establishments in the United States
title: Wayback Burgers
